title: Coty Slides After Pulling Fiscal 2026 Guidance
description: Coty Inc. shares slid after the mass-market beauty company scrapped its fiscal 2026 outlook and warned of a weaker-than-anticipated third quarter.
content: Coty Inc. shares slid after the mass-market beauty company scrapped its fiscal 2026 outlook and warned of a weaker-than-anticipated third quarter.
